QuestData.Title: The Lesson of the Iron Staff
QuestData.Description: To train, first you must be properly equipped. Retrieve a weapon from one of the weapon racks below, bring it to me, and show me that you know how to hold it properly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Loot a training weapon from a weapon rack and then equip it.

Objectives.Objective: Loot and Equip a Training Weapon
